body:
## Expected Behavior
Temporal accepts user generated workflow ids up to `limit.maxIDLength` dynamic config value (default 1000).

## Actual Behavior
Workflow ids longer than 255 chars are rejected on SQL persistence because of schema limitation: https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/master/schema/mysql/v57/temporal/schema.sql#L33 (and everywhere else).

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem
Start workflow with long id (256 chars or more).

comments.body:
either change schema to allow longer ID
or maxIDLength change to 255, but someone could still change to longer.
i would propose making all DB support 1000 char (why not 1024?) and hard code the 1000 char workflow ID limit, instead of dynamic config

title: SQL schema limits workflow_id to 255
